name: Pirats "Morning" Blast
description:
48 Hours Game Jam Result April 2022

How To Play:

  • Player 1 begins.
  • Everyone starts with 1 Flame, 1 Bomb, One Move. 
  • Destroy Chests to increase your strength.
  • Destroy the enemy to win.

Online Play Only! So invite your friends! Limited to 20 CCU!!!

Have Fun! There will be Bugs!!!
